density.note: Ice is less dense than liquid water (anomaly)

latentHeatOfFusion.note: Energy required to melt ice to water at 0°C

volumetricExpansionCoefficient.note: Ice expands when frozen; 9% larger volume than liquid water

electricalConductivity.note: Pure water is a poor conductor. Distilled water even lower (~0.0001 S/m).
electricalConductivity.applicationUse: Shows baseline; compare to saltwater (5.0 S/m) to understand electrolytes
